title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Document the project's objectives, features, and functionalities. Define key performance indicators (KPIs) for each module.

title: Design Customer Behavior Module
description: Create a module for analyzing customer behavior, including heat maps, customer segmentation, and buying patterns.

title: Design Sales Trends Module
description: Create a module for analyzing sales trends, including revenue forecasting, product performance analysis, and seasonal trends.

title: Design Inventory Optimization Module
description: Create a module for optimizing inventory, including demand forecasting, reordering recommendations, and out-of-stock alerts.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the analytics platform.

title: Develop Backend for Analytics Platform
description: Implement the backend services for data processing, analysis, and reporting.

title: Develop Database Scheme
description: Design the database schema to store and manage all necessary data.

title: Implement DevOps Strategy
description: Setup continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines and scalable infrastructure for the platform.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Tests
description: Test the platform for functionality, usability, performance, and security.

title: Review and Approve Design Documents
description: Review design documents to ensure they meet project requirements.

title: Review and Approve Code
description: Review code for quality, performance, and adherence to best practices.
